title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning for binary files
description: When using declare warning messages to target .class files from injars, the source path is incorrectly listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. It has also been observed that in some cases, the filenames do not appear at all in the messages.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages for .class files is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. Additionally, there are instances where the filenames are not displayed at all in these messages.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the code provided in 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/..' folder.
2. Observe the declare warning messages generated.
3. Note that the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main' in the messages.
4. In some cases, the filenames may not be displayed at all in the messages.
